topics.body:
i just had a dream, where it was mostly normal stuff of travel etc.

however at 1 point of the dream i was with my friends and i remember i made fun of anothers friend dead father, he like insulted me and i was just like "dude, why u so mad" and i was pretty much acting like a tool.

god it was awful.

then i had a resident evil/left 4 dead dream for some reason, where the left 4 dead 1 crew kills wesker.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5359af076368727024360000#post_5359af076368727024360000
Last night i had a dream about Russian planes firebombing my hometown.
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5359af076368727024360000#post_5359af076368727024360000
I had a dream where I went on vacation to some Thai or Chinese city and I had to eat at an airport.
I would sound normal until I realized I was all alone, eating at a large circular table and the only ones with me was a waiter who apparently was a walking skeleton in a suit with a silver tray at one hand.
It was terrible.

Before that, I had superpowers and was stalking a bunch of college girls in a yellow mini car who seem to work at that same airport.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body: I dreamed I was back in New Orleans.

topics.body:
So I've been checking out the previews and stuff for Wolfenstein: The New Order, and holy shit it actually looks pretty good. Its a really violent shooter with what looks like some decent stealth elements and some old school shooter tropes that I've missed.

You know, for a long time killing nazis was cliche but now it almost feels like a fucking breath of fresh air, how sad is that?
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
